thread.title: Great Hotel in Manhattan
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in Manhattan - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 404maryellenh
title: Great Hotel in Manhattan
text: I was very pleased with my stay. All staff members were helpful and friendly. We checked our bags upon arrival and went out before the room was ready. They called us when our room was ready - three hours before regular check-in time. I appreciated the early check-in. The room was clean and looked like it had been done over fairly recently. I would definitely stay here again.
